pullrequest.title: Update dependencies based on feedback during package builds.

content.raw: Update: This broke the from source instructions. I updated the readme accordingly so that rosdep doesnt try to install gazebo7 (that conflicts with gazebo8) #!/osrf/servicesim/wiki/commits/2af7f551ba04f3ea6d18114a5858479ed44b3aa6
